Name: Suicide Guy Deluxe Plus
About the game: Suicide Guy Deluxe Plus is a first person action-puzzle game set in physics based worlds. This new enhanced edition includes lots of improvements plus extra contents. You'll assume the role of a nice Big Guy that will need to wake up in order to save the most important thing in his life. Features - 31 Crazy levels set in Suicide Guy's mind - Absurd creatures to annoy - Physics based levels - You will: pick up items, throw them, activate mechanisms and even burp! - Collectible items to find - A very important mission to accomplish What does the new Deluxe Edition include? - 3 new exclusive levels - Cloud saves - Performance improvements - Graphics enhancements - Highly polished physics interactions - New languages support (Korean, Arabic, Dutch, Swedish and Norwegian) - Options for completely customizable button mappings - Exclusive levels will be added as a Free update for all players in the next months after the initial release, so stay tuned! Players will be challenged with the most complex and original brain teasers. The game includes mature content, in particular violence, alcohol abuse and self-harm. Despite the title the game is NOT about suicide or depression.
